archimate:DataObject.name: MACAddressValue
archimate:DataObject.documentation: This class is used to define a list of MAC addresses and MAC address range values as an unordered list of strings; each specifying a MAC address or a range of MAC addresses according to the canonical 802 MAC address format. Each string entry is either: - a single MAC address; such as 0000:00A5:0000 - a range of MAC addresses specified by an address and mask; such as 0000:00A5:0000;FFFF:FFFF:0000; which defines a range of MAC addresses in which the first four octets are equal to 0000:00A5.
